startMessage: Hi {}. This bot is for music search. Use menu to control * Track SearchğŸ” - Track Search Menu * Lyrics search ğŸ“” - Lyrics search menu * Tags searchğŸ” - Track auto-search tags menu * Settingsâš™ï¸ - Bot settings
searchTrack_Main: Track Search. Select a search method SoundCloud - download only 30 seconds Use the menu to select
searchTrack_ErrorSC: Sorry, the SoundCLoud download may not work, try again. If it doesn't work, sorry...
helpMessage: Help in using the bot: Use the menu to interact with the bot. Some commands are also available. /clip Query - Search for a YouTube clip /lyric Query - Genius Lyric Search Command /tag - Used only in the description of the sent audio. The /lyric and /clip commands can be used to respond to audio in chat. Also, you can send a voice message or video to search for a song (no more than 15 seconds)
lyricError: We didn't find anything to your query...
lyricStart: We start the search for your query.
lyricTooLong: Sorry, the lyrics are too big for the message. Open it in a browser {} - {}
searchTags_Main: Please send the audio, it will be searched if it already contains tags or add them in the signature of the message
searchTags_Error: We were unable to find the tags, try adding a description to the audio, or check it for correctness...
searchTags_ErrorExt: Sorry, but the file extension should be .mp3.
